entry.title: CocoaHeads April 2009 Meeting Agenda
entry.content:
Next CocoaHeads meeting is Thursday, April 9th at Indy Hall  link.

Agenda

  • Meet & Greet - Communicate with other humans using the high bandwidth "face-to-face" protocol.
  • Show & Tell
    • Mike Zornek will demo his latest application, code-named “Profit Train”
    • Andy Mroczkowski will launch a (very) small new open source application, and talk about unit testing and the Google Toolbox for Mac.
  • Mac Programming Foundations Class announcement
  • Open Hack - Bring projects and questions

entry.title: CocoaHeads March 2009 Meeting Agenda
entry.content:
Next CocoaHeads meeting is Thursday, March 12th at Indy Hall  link.

Agenda

  • Meet & Greet - Communicate with other humans using the high bandwidth "face-to-face" protocol.
  • Show & Tell
    • Far McKon will discuss the Image Capture system and cool stuff coming from Neat R&D
    • Corey Floyd and his team will demo their new iPhone app Compounds and talk about their iPhone development experience
  • Cocoa Beginner Class - we’ll talk about our current thinking and plans on the subject
  • Open Hack - Bring projects and questions

entry.title: CocoaHeads February 2009 Meeting Recap
entry.content:
Great turnout - thanks to everyone who participated!

Project Calculator Updates

By request, more comments were added, and variable names clarified in the existing Calculator source code. No functionality has changed. The source for the Calculator project can be found here.

Learning Cocoa

We are beginning to gather ideas about how to best serve the growing population of attendees who are new to Cocoa. A lightweight Cocoa “class” is being considered, but we need feedback on content, structure, and schedule from our target audience.

Please visit the PhillyCocoa Google group to contribute to the discussion.

Next Meeting - March 12th 2009

Our next meeting is March 12th, 7-9P and IndyHall. Far McKon is on schedule to discuss and demo some cool stuff using the Image Capture framework.

entry.title: CocoaHeads February 2009 Meeting Agenda
entry.content:
Next CocoaHeads meeting is Thursday, February 12th at Indy Hall  link.

Agenda

After group introductions, Michael Zornek (@zorn) has volunteered to give a brief overview of JRFeedbackProvider.

Following, we will break out into groups to continue work on Project Calculator (or code that you brought with you if you prefer).

Project Calculator Starting Point

A starting point for the Calculator project has been posted on github.  It is based @jallum's group's work from last meeting.  The current trunk version now does basic integer arithmetic.

See you there!

entry.title: GitHub Repository
entry.content:
GitHub repository has been created for sharing our Project Calculator code.

Here’s the link:

http://github.com/phillycocoa/projectcalculator/tree/master
